name: Rats and More Rats
text: Contents: Vermin (I) and Vermin (II). Vermin (II) and Vermin (III) in expert mode instead.) Vermin and Standard Encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Feral Instincts). Setup: Put the Even More Rats Environment into play. Put a Regular Rats minion into play engaged with each player. Shuffle the encounter deck. Advance to stage 1B.

name: Thirst for Revenge
text: Contents: Scorpion (I) and Scorpion (II). Scorpion (II) and Scorpion (III) in expert mode instead.). Scorpion and Standard Encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Feral Instincts). Setup: Put the J. Jonah Jameson suport into play. Put the Scorpion's Tail into play and attach it to Scorpion. Shuffle the encounter deck. Advance to stage 1B.
errata: Scorpion's Tail is an attachment not un upgrade (Merlin).

name: Wake Your Inner Lizard
text: Hinder 1[per_hero] (When Revealed: Place an additionnal 1[per_hero] threat here).

name: Toxic Gas
text: Hinder 1[per_hero] (When Revealed: Place an additionnal 1[per_hero] threat here).
